ffi-could-not-validate: Could not validate source due to errors.
ffi-desc: Framework for embedding multiple scripting languages into MediaWiki pages
ffi-doc-page-header: '''This is the documentation page for the ''$1'' script [[$2]]'''.
ffi-doc-page-does-not-exist: ''Documentation for this $1 script can be created at [[$2]]''.
ffi-error-category-desc: There was an error when processing the scripts included on the page.
ffi-invalid-engine-specification-error: The specification for the engine "$1" is invalid ($2).
ffi-missing-engine-error: No engine has been configured for script "$1".
ffi-missing-engine-header: ''The engine needed to execute this script is missing''.
ffi-missing-function-name-error: You did not specify a function to call. You must specify a function to call as the second argument.
ffi-no-engine-error: No valid engine has been configured for this file extension.
ffi-python-missing-proc-open-error: Cannot create process: "proc_open" is not available. Check PHP's "disable_functions" configuration directive.
ffi-python-open-process-error: Failed to open process to "$1" using the "$2" executable: $3.
